tool_description: Payment processing, escrow, and payouts in one simple API.  Accept credit cards and debit bank accounts for your business. Proceeds are available immediately.  Use with any card processor or as a stand-alone service for same-day bank deposits.  Combine card processing and bank payouts with escrow.
name: Balanced
title: Balanced

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jkwade-balanced.p.rapidapi.com/bank_accounts/BA3zOLWBTIv05IuikTYcYXBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jkwade-balanced.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jkwade-balanced.p.rapidapi.com/bank_accounts/{bank_account_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jkwade-balanced.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Returns a list of bank accounts that you've created but haven't deleted.

api_list.name: List All Cards
api_list.description: Returns a list of cards that you've created.

api_list.name: List All Credits For A Bank Account
api_list.description: Returns a list of credits you've previously created to a specific bank account. The credits_uri is a convenient uri provided so that you can simply issue a GET to the credits_uri. The credits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent credits appearing first.
